name: Orbital Smash!
description:
Jump from planet to planet in this otherworldly fighting game! Shoot at your opponent and curve shots around the gravity of the asteroids to claim victory! Submitted as part of the createChester 2022 Game Jam!

2 Controllers required.

Controls:

Left Stick - Move

Right Stick - Aim

South Button - Jump

Right Trigger - Shoot

The Explorers are:

Joe Barlow - Level 6 Games Development

Aria Charlton - Level 6 Games Development

Ryan Eshraghi-yazdi - Level 5 Games Development

Jay Phillips - Level 4 Computer Science

Pragadeeswaran Durai - Level 4 Computer Science

Nabeel Ayomide Folaji - Level 4 Computer Science
